roleset.name: upset slightly
roleset.note: TROUBLE-V NOTES: 'trouble' based on financial subcorpus; 'troubled' based on BOLT-1. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from trouble.01-v)
TROUBLED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from troubled.01-j)

role.descr: instrument or manner (if arg0 also present)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The volatility inherent in program trading troubled other traders, too.
example.arg: The volatility inherent in program trading

example.name: adjectival rel: troubled; with CXN
example.text: I 'm not sure she is as troubled by U.S. actions around the world as I am , but I think so .
example.arg: by U.S. actions around the world
